statement:
The lemma used in the derivation of the functional equation for the
Riemann Xi function. This functional equation is not as remarkable as
the one for the Xi function, because it does not actually extend the
domain of the function.

$$\theta\left(\frac{1}{x}\right) = \sqrt{x} \theta(x)$$

The proof relies on the Cauchy integral formula and the Poisson
summation formula.
names: functional equation for the theta function
